Key Match Events: Ferran Torres scored the only goal of the match
Pre-Game Insights: Spain's B team was expected to win the match but Albania showed up to compete
Post-Match Reflections: Albania showed resilience and determination in their first European championships
Miscellaneous Highlights: Albania's team is made up of players from nine different countries
Others: Spain had already qualified for the next round and were focusing on giving opportunities to their bench players
